LoginPage.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
LoginPage.title: Welcome back

HomePage.title: Home
HomePage.description: Welcome Home! This is the place where you can find the latest updates, featured articles, and helpful resources to get started with our platform. Explore our content and enjoy your stay!

ProfilePage.title: Profile
ProfilePage.description: Here is your profile page! View and update your personal information, track your activity, and manage your preferences. Customize your experience to suit your needs and stay connected with your community.

ErrorPage.title: Something went wrong!
ErrorPage.description: We've unfortunately encountered an error. You can try to <retry>reload the page</retry> you were visiting.

NotFoundPage.title: Page not found.
NotFoundPage.description: Please double-check the browser address bar or use the navigation to go to a known page.
